Here's some easy ways you can improve your EcoScore:
 - Use a reusable water bottle
 - Unplug your chargers, lamps, etc. when not in use
 - Carpool with friends when going off campus
 - Bring a tupperware to put food into rather than asking for a takeout container
 - Limit your time in the shower to less than 10 minutes
 - Put on a sweater instead of turning up the heater
 - Dry your hands on a towel rather than waste paper towels
